scripts._copy-uxp-html: rm -rf src/pages/uxp-ref/reference-html && cp -r node_modules/uxp-documentation/_transclusions/photoshop/uxp/reference-html src/pages/uxp-ref/ && cp node_modules/uxp-documentation/reference-html.js reference-html.js
scripts._copy-uxp-spectrum: rm -rf src/pages/uxp-ref/reference-spectrum && cp -r node_modules/uxp-documentation/_transclusions/photoshop/uxp/reference-spectrum src/pages/uxp-ref/ && cp node_modules/uxp-documentation/reference-spectrum.js reference-spectrum.js
scripts._copy-uxp-js: rm -rf src/pages/uxp-ref/reference-js && cp -r node_modules/uxp-documentation/_transclusions/photoshop/uxp/reference-js src/pages/uxp-ref/ && cp node_modules/uxp-documentation/reference-js.js reference-js.js
scripts._copy-uxp-css: rm -rf src/pages/uxp-ref/reference-css && cp -r node_modules/uxp-documentation/_transclusions/photoshop/uxp/reference-css src/pages/uxp-ref/ && cp node_modules/uxp-documentation/reference-css.js reference-css.js
scripts._copy-uxp: npm run _copy-uxp-js && npm run _copy-uxp-css && npm run _copy-uxp-html && npm run _copy-uxp-spectrum
